name: Light & Shadow (Lardonsaurus)
description:
In this game, you control two characters : the Soul and the Body.

As the soul, your goal is to jump on the white platform to reach the yellow portal.

As the body, your goal is to fend off the endless waves of shadows coming for you.

Controls :

Z/Q/S/S : Move Around

Jump : Space
Tab : Swap between Body and Soul

Left click : Fire

R : Reload
Mouse wheel up : Swap to AK

Mouse wheel down : Swap to Glock

When you will swap to the Body for the first time, there will be a small bug : you will have the AK skin in hand but the Glock will be equipped.
Be sure to mouse wheel up to fix it ! :)
